CREATE TABLE "utilisateurs_drtss" ( "id" BIGINT GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, "nom" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "prenom" VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, "matricule" VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, "titre_honorifique" VARCHAR(255), "tel" VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, "actif" BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL, "created_at" TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
